author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Reg-Pentair Announces Redemption Of 2.900% Senior Notes Due 2018
text:
May 16 (Reuters) - Pentair PLC:
* REG-PENTAIR ANNOUNCES REDEMPTION OF 2.900% SENIOR NOTES DUE 2018
* PENTAIR PLC - AS OF MAY 16, 2018, THERE WAS $255.3 MILLION AGGREGATE PRINCIPAL AMOUNT OF NOTES OUTSTANDING
* PENTAIR PLC - UNIT WILL REDEEM OUTSTANDING 2.900% SENIOR NOTES DUE 2018 ON JUNE 15, 2018
* PENTAIR PLC - UNIT TO FUND REDEMPTION WITH PROCEEDS RECEIVED FROM CASH TRANSFER BY UNIT OF NVENT ELECTRIC RELATED TO DISTRIBUTION OF NVENT Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
